statements: DELETE FROM fashion_collaborations WHERE designer_id = 'c5f94341-7a48-4c26-9b6d-6d1659df27f5' AND collaboration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM designer_portfolio WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM celebrity_collaborations WHERE celebrity_name = 'Beyonce' AND designer_name = 'Gucci';
DELETE FROM designer_portfolio WHERE designer_age > 30 AND designer_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM designer WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM designers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM collaborations_clothing WHERE collaboration_id = 1 AND item_id = 3;
DELETE FROM designers WHERE age > 40 AND design_style = 'Modern';
